column5: I don't hear much talk about Muskies in Rainy Lake. I know they are in there but perhaps only in certain areas or in numbers too small to excite real Muskie hunters. Any info? I don't chase them on pupose. Just curious as we will be fishing the East End of the lake in a couple weeks.

If you're looking for Muskie, Rainy is not the body of water you want to fish. I've fished the North Arm and Kettle Falls areas of Rainy. Muskie are not common but some can be found around Ash Bay, if I remember correctly. Nimstug
Thanks....I am not looking for them,just curious.We are fishing Walleyes and Pike at the East end of the lake
